verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <S%H477><s%> Then Elisha שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> ye the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּעֵ֤ת ׀ <S%H6256><s%> about this time מָחָר֙ <S%H4279><s%> To morrow סְאָֽה־ <S%H5429><s%> [shall] a measure סֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour בְּשֶׁ֗קֶל <S%H8255><s%> [be sold] for a shekel וְסָאתַ֧יִם <S%H5429><s%> and two measures שְׂעֹרִ֛ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley בְּשֶׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> for a shekel בְּשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַשָּׁלִ֡ישׁ <S%H7991><s%> Then a lord אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose לַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <S%H4428><s%> the king נִשְׁעָ֨ן <S%H8172><s%> leaned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> on whose hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> of God וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Behold [if] the LORD עֹשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> would make אֲרֻבּוֹת֙ <S%H699><s%> windows בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> in heaven הֲיִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> might this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> be? And he said הִנְּכָ֤ה <S%H2005><s%> behold רֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> Behold thou shalt see בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> [it] with thine eyes וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> but shalt not eat ס

וְאַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> And there were four אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H376><s%> one הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מְצֹרָעִ֖ים <S%H6879><s%> leprous פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the entering in הַשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to another מָ֗ה <S%H4100><s%> Why אֲנַ֛חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we יֹשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> Why sit פֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> here עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מָֽתְנוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> we here until we die

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אָמַרְנוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> If we say נָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> We will enter הָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city וְהָרָעָ֤ב <S%H7458><s%> then the famine בָּעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> [is] in the city וָמַ֣תְנוּ <S%H4191><s%> and we shall die שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if יָשַׁ֥בְנוּ <S%H3427><s%> there and if we sit still פֹ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> here וָמָ֑תְנוּ <S%H4191><s%> here we die וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now לְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> come וְנִפְּלָה֙ <S%H5307><s%> and let us fall אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> unto the host אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יְחַיֻּ֣נוּ <S%H2421><s%> if they save us alive נִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> we shall live וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if יְמִיתֻ֖נוּ <S%H4191><s%> and if they kill וָמָֽתְנוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> us we shall but die

וַיָּק֣וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> And they rose up בַנֶּ֔שֶׁף <S%H5399><s%> in the twilight לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> to go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> unto the camp אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> and when they were come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קְצֵה֙ <S%H7097><s%> to the uttermost part מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> behold [there was] no man

וַאדֹנָ֞י <S%H136><s%> For the Lord הִשְׁמִ֣יעַ ׀ <S%H8085><s%> to hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> had made the host אֲרָ֗ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a noise רֶ֙כֶב֙ <S%H7393><s%> of chariots ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and a noise ס֔וּס <S%H5483><s%> of horses ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [even] the noise חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> host גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of a great וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> and they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָחִ֗יו <S%H251><s%> to another הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָֽׂכַר־ <S%H7936><s%> hath hired עָלֵינוּ֩ <S%H5921><s%> against מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Lo the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכֵ֧י <S%H4428><s%> against us the kings הַחִתִּ֛ים <S%H2850><s%> of the Hittites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> and the kings מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of the Egyptians לָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיָּקוּמוּ֮ <S%H6965><s%> Wherefore they arose וַיָּנ֣וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> and fled בַנֶּשֶׁף֒ <S%H5399><s%> in the twilight וַיַּעַזְב֣וּ <S%H5800><s%> and left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H168><s%> their tents וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סֽוּסֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5483><s%> and their horses וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמֹ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H2543><s%> and their asses הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> even the camp כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> it was וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> as it [was] and fled אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H5315><s%> for their life

וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <S%H935><s%> came הַֽמְצֹרָעִ֨ים <S%H6879><s%> And when these lepers הָאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> to the uttermost part הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> they went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֹ֤הֶל <S%H168><s%> tent אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> into one וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> and did eat וַיִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> and carried מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there כֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> thence silver וְזָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> and gold וּבְגָדִ֔ים <S%H899><s%> and raiment וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went וַיַּטְמִ֑נוּ <S%H2934><s%> and hid וַיָּשֻׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> [it] and came again וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and entered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> tent אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> into another וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> and carried מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went וַיַּטְמִֽנוּ׃ <S%H2934><s%> and hid

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> Then they said אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to another לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not כֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> after that אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we עֹשִׂ֗ים <S%H6213><s%> We do הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> not well this day הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> This יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> [is] a day בְּשֹׂרָ֣ה <S%H1309><s%> of good tidings ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we מַחְשִׁ֗ים <S%H2814><s%> and we hold our peace וְחִכִּ֛ינוּ <S%H2442><s%> if we tarry עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until א֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> light הַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> till the morning וּמְצָאָ֣נוּ <S%H4672><s%> will come עָו֑וֹן <S%H5771><s%> some mischief וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> come וְנָבֹ֔אָה <S%H935><s%> that we may go וְנַגִּ֖ידָה <S%H5046><s%> and tell בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> household הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king's

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> So they came וַֽיִּקְרְאוּ֮ <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שֹׁעֵ֣ר <S%H7778><s%> unto the porter הָעִיר֒ <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and they told לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> them לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> them saying בָּ֚אנוּ <S%H935><s%> We came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> to the camp אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and behold [there was] no man וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> there neither voice אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of man כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo הַסּ֤וּס <S%H5483><s%> but horses אָסוּר֙ <S%H631><s%> tied וְהַחֲמ֣וֹר <S%H2543><s%> and asses אָס֔וּר <S%H631><s%> tied וְאֹהָלִ֖ים <S%H168><s%> and the tents כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> And he called הַשֹּֽׁעֲרִ֑ים <S%H7778><s%> the porters וַיַּגִּ֕ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and they told בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [it] to the king's פְּנִֽימָה׃ <S%H6441><s%> within

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants אַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> I will now shew נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> will now לָכֶ֔ם אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָ֥שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> have done לָ֖נוּ אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> you what the Syrians יָדְע֞וּ <S%H3045><s%> to us They know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> When רְעֵבִ֣ים <S%H7457><s%> that we [be] hungry אֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וַיֵּצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> therefore are they gone out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <S%H4264><s%> of the camp לְהֵחָבֵ֤ה <S%H2247><s%> to hide [בְהַשָּׂדֶה כ] (בַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> country ק) לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יֵצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> When they come out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְנִתְפְּשֵׂ֣ם <S%H8610><s%> we shall catch חַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> them alive וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city נָבֹֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> and get

וַיַּעַן֩ <S%H6030><s%> answered אֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> And one מֵעֲבָדָ֜יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said וְיִקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> Let [some] take נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> Please חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> I pray thee five מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַסּוּסִים֮ <S%H5483><s%> of the horses הַֽנִּשְׁאָרִים֮ <S%H7604><s%> that remain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁאֲרוּ־ <S%H7604><s%> which are left בָהּ֒ הִנָּ֗ם <S%H2009><s%> Behold כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all [הֶהָמֹון כ] (הֲמֹ֤ון <S%H1995><s%> the multitude ק) יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who נִשְׁאֲרוּ־ <S%H7604><s%> that are left בָ֔הּ הִנָּ֕ם <S%H2005><s%> like כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> in the city (behold they [are] as all the multitude יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of the Israelites אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who תָּ֑מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> that are consumed וְנִשְׁלְחָ֖ה <S%H7971><s%> ) and let us send וְנִרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> and see

וַיִּקְח֕וּ <S%H3947><s%> They took שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> therefore two רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariot סוּסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> horses וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king אַחֲרֵ֧י <S%H310><s%> after מַחֲנֵֽה־ <S%H4264><s%> the host אֲרָ֛ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go וּרְאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> and see

וַיֵּלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> went אַחֲרֵיהֶם֮ <S%H310><s%> after עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> them הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> them unto Jordan וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> and lo all the way מְלֵאָ֤ה <S%H4392><s%> [was] full בְגָדִים֙ <S%H899><s%> of garments וְכֵלִ֔ים <S%H3627><s%> and vessels אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִשְׁלִ֥יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> had cast away אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> which the Syrians [בְּהֵחָפְזָם כ] (בְּחָפְזָ֑ם <S%H2648><s%> haste ק) וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> returned הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> And the messengers וַיַּגִּ֖דוּ <S%H5046><s%> and told לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went out הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people וַיָּבֹ֕זּוּ <S%H962><s%> and spoiled אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> the tents אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> Then סְאָה־ <S%H5429><s%> So a measure סֹ֜לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour בְּשֶׁ֗קֶל <S%H8255><s%> was [sold] for a shekel וְסָאתַ֧יִם <S%H5429><s%> and two measures שְׂעֹרִ֛ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley בְּשֶׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> for a shekel כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <S%H4428><s%> And the king הִפְקִ֨יד <S%H6485><s%> appointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁלִ֜ישׁ <S%H7991><s%> the lord אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose נִשְׁעָ֤ן <S%H8172><s%> he leaned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to have יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> on whose hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> to have the charge of the gate וַיִּרְמְסֻ֧הוּ <S%H7429><s%> trode הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people בַּשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> upon him in the gate וַיָּמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> and he died כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who דִּבֶּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> had said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> as the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who דִּבֶּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> who spake בְּרֶ֥דֶת <S%H3381><s%> came down הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> when the king אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> happened כְּדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> had spoken אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And it came to pass as the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying סָאתַ֨יִם <S%H5429><s%> Two measures שְׂעֹרִ֜ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley בְּשֶׁ֗קֶל <S%H8255><s%> for a shekel וּֽסְאָה־ <S%H5429><s%> and a measure סֹ֙לֶת֙ <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour בְּשֶׁ֔קֶל <S%H8255><s%> for a shekel יִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> happened כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> about this time מָחָ֔ר <S%H4279><s%> shall be to morrow בְּשַׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַשָּׁלִ֜ישׁ <S%H7991><s%> And that lord אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> of God וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> and said וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Now behold [if] the LORD עֹשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> should make אֲרֻבּוֹת֙ <S%H699><s%> windows בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> in heaven הֲיִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become כַּדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> might such a thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> such וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> be? And he said הִנְּךָ֤ <S%H2005><s%> behold רֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> Behold thou shalt see בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> it with thine eyes וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> but shalt not eat

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> happened ל֖וֹ כֵּ֑ן <S%H3651><s%> and so וַיִּרְמְס֨וּ <S%H7429><s%> trode אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> And so it fell out unto him for the people בַּשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> upon him in the gate וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he died ס
